mapper.sql: u.user_id userId , u.ad_id loginName , u.division_id divisionId , d.division_group_name divisionName , u.mail mail , u.full_name fullName , rg.role_group_name roleGroupName

FROM T_USER u LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DIVISION d on (d.division_id=u.division_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USERROLEGROUP urg on (urg.user_id=u.user_id AND NOW() BETWEEN urg.start_day AND urg.end_day) LEFT OUTER JOIN T_ROLEGROUP rg on (rg.role_group_id=urg.role_group_id)
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_name roleName FROM T_USERROLEGROUP urg JOIN T_ROLEGROUP rg ON (rg.role_group_id=urg.role_group_id) JOIN T_ROLEGROUPROLE rgr ON (rgr.role_group_id=rg.role_group_id) JOIN T_ROLE r ON (r.role_id=rgr.role_id) WHERE NOW() BETWEEN urg.start_day AND urg.end_day AND urg.user_id=#{employeeId}

select d.division_id divisionId from T_DIVISION d WHERE d.lLV1ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV2ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV3ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV4ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV5ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId})
